mapper.select: SELECT p.para_content_zh AS paraContentZh, p.para_type AS paraType, i.sen_content AS senContent, i.sen_trans AS senTrans FROM paraphrase p JOIN illustrative_sentence i ON p.para_id = i.para_id WHERE p.word_id = #{wordId};

SELECT DISTINCT w.word_id AS wordId, w.word AS word, w.hiragana AS hiragana, w.romaji AS romaji, w.pronunciation AS pronunciation, p.para_content_zh AS paraContentZh, p.para_content_ja AS paraContentJa, p.para_type AS paraType, i.sen_content AS senContent, i.sen_trans AS senTrans, group_concat(d.d_name separator ',') as dictionaryNames
FROM word w LEFT JOIN paraphrase p ON w.word_id = p.word_id LEFT JOIN illustrative_sentence i ON p.para_id= i.para_id LEFT JOIN word_dictionary wd ON w.word_id = wd.word_id LEFT JOIN dectionary d ON wd.d_id = d.d_id WHERE (w.hiragana LIKE CONCAT(#{word}, '%')) OR (w.word Like CONCAT(#{word}, '%')) group by w.word_id, w.word, w.hiragana, w.romaji, w.pronunciation, p.para_content_zh, p.para_content_ja, p.para_type, i.sen_content, i.sen_trans
